text: Large crowds came to him, having with them the 15:30 lame, blind, mute, crippled ¦ lame, blind, crippled, mute NA ¦ mute, blind, lame, crippled SBL ¦ lame, mute, blind, crippled TH ¦ lame, crippled, blind, mute WHlame, blind, mute, crippled, and many others. They put them at the feet of Jesus, and he healed them.
